content: Dear Susan, I so appreciate your ability with words…to write about the unthinkable and then even laugh at it, play with it, find love, humor, compassion and light amid all of the other shit; to find some meaning in it all. I can relate on so many levels and on others I am at a loss for words. Thank you for putting this into the world. I am going to share as I have you past pieces. Sending you light and love. xoxo Tomasen
